About the Company: Lead Financial Services Ltd is belongs to finance and investment Industry. Lead Financial Services Ltd. operates as a non banking financial company in India. They provide investment, financing and consultancy services. Lead Financial Services Ltd. was earlier known as privy financial services and they got their present name with effect from September 5, 2003. They generate income from dividend, profit on sale of investment, interest income, advisory services, capital gain, sale of shares. The company is part a group, which includes associate companies such as LFS Securities and LFS Services.
